title: Case, ca. 1690
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Inside decorated with paper printed with a floral pattern. Red leather case for three implements, irregular shaped, oval in section, slightly tapering towards the bottom. Leather stamped and decorated with gold, chain-pattern along the sides and a stylized fleur-de-lis on the front.

tombstone.epitaph:
Case, ca. 1690.
ca. 1690. leather, paper. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-264-a.
